meta.description: Mapping of published code listings and related media for MQL5 and MQL4 products
meta.notes: Use `publications` for links to codebase posts/listings and `videos` for YouTube references. Platform field uses standardized MT4 or MT5 casing.

publications.title: Viral (1M+ views) 4 Hour Range Strategy coded and tested - MT5
publications.description: This EA is intended to test a popular trading strategy. My own backtest shows that this strategy does not work as it was intended. The strategy follows the following logic:First the strategy marks the high and the low of the first 4H candle, using the New york time zone.After the first 4H candle is formed the strategy waits for a 5 Minute candle to close outside the Range. If a 5 Minute candle closes above the High and then a 5 Minute candle closes back in the Range, there is a sell signal.If a 5 Minute candle closes below the Low and then a 5 Minute candle closes back in the Range, there is a buy signal.

publications.title: Viral (1M+ views) 4 Hour Range Strategy coded and tested - MT4
publications.description: This EA is intended to test a popular trading strategy. My own backtest shows that this strategy does not work as it was intended. The strategy follows the following logic:First the strategy marks the high and the low of the first 4H candle, using the New york time zone.After the first 4H candle is formed the strategy waits for a 5 Minute candle to close outside the Range. If a 5 Minute candle closes above the High and then a 5 Minute candle closes back in the Range, there is a sell signal.If a 5 Minute candle closes below the Low and then a 5 Minute candle closes back in the Range, there is a buy signal.

publications.title: Popular MACD Strategy from Viral YouTube Video (3.5M+ Views) - MT5
publications.description: This Expert Advisor is based on a MACD crossover strategy with trend filtering and support/resistance confirmation. The logic is built according to the most common interpretation of such strategies, using standard indicators. The code is full of comments explaining every line of code step by step.

publications.title: Viral MACD Strategy (3.5M+ Views) â€” Recreated and Automated - MT4
publications.description: This Expert Advisor is based on a MACD crossover strategy with trend filtering and support/resistance confirmation. The logic is built according to the most common interpretation of such strategies, using standard indicators. The code is full of comments explaining every line of code step by step.

publications.title: Moving Average Crossover with and without Martingale functionality - MT5
publications.description: This Expert Advisor is a simple Moving Average Crossover strategy with optional Martingale functionality. It uses two moving averages to generate buy and sell signals. The code is well-commented to help users understand the logic behind the strategy.

publications.title: Grid and Martingale Include File - MT4
publications.description: This include file enables programmers to create Martingale and grid trading strategies with ease.

publications.title: Grid and Martingale Include File - MT5
publications.description: This include file enables programmers to create Martingale and grid trading strategies with ease.

publications.title: Rainbow Indicator - MT5
publications.description: This is an indicator with a rainbow-like display, both for trend or pullback prediction.

publications.title: Rainbow Indicator - MT4
publications.description: This is an indicator with a rainbow-like display, both for trend or pullback prediction.

publications.title: Support and Resistance Indicator - MT5
publications.description: This is a custom support and resistance indicator, signaling bouncebacks and key market levels.

publications.title: Support and Resistance Indicator - MT4
publications.description: This is a custom support and resistance indicator, signaling bouncebacks and key market levels.

publications.title: Breakout Martingale EA - MT5
publications.description: The Martingale Breakout strategy is an Expert Advisor (EA) designed for trading in the Forex market. This EA combines a breakout trading approach with elements of the Martingale money management system to optimize trading performance.

publications.title: Breakout Martingale EA - MT4
publications.description: The Martingale Breakout strategy is an Expert Advisor (EA) designed for trading in the Forex market. This EA combines a breakout trading approach with elements of the Martingale money management system to optimize trading performance.

publications.title: Easy to Use Hedging Class Library - MT5
publications.description: This EA is a demonstration of how you can implement your own hedging strategy with the help of the include file.

publications.title: Easy to Use Hedging Class Library - MT4
publications.description: This EA is a demonstration of how you can implement your own hedging strategy with the help of the include file.

publications.title: Calendar-Based Backtesting: Event-Driven Trading EA Library - MT5
publications.description: This script and EA enables coders to backtest their news-based strategies which use the MQL5 calendar.

publications.title: Probability and Signals Class Library - MT4
publications.description: With these classes, you can create and test your signals at runtime. This library provides comprehensive tools for probability calculations and signal generation, enabling you to build sophisticated trading signal systems with real-time testing capabilities.

publications.title: Probability and Signals Class Library - MT5
publications.description: With these classes, you can create and test your signals at runtime. This library provides comprehensive tools for probability calculations and signal generation, enabling you to build sophisticated trading signal systems with real-time testing capabilities.
